home.title: Real time dashboard and analytics
home.description: F1 Telemetry is a real-time telemetry dashboard so you can follow Formula 1 completely and from anywhere, without needing to watch the broadcast.
home.mapDesc: Real-time preview of the live map.
home.audioDesc: Listen instantly to each driver’s team radio during the race—we also use AI for translation and transcription!
home.circlesDesc: We keep adding features to boost race analysis, such as the Circle of Doom, perfect for undercut decisions.
home.version: Version 1.6.0 allows you to tell jokes and display them on the entire screen, for all users!
home.announce: We are still working on migrating to a new server, this website may not work properly until then. See you in march!

footer.legal: This website is not associated, affiliated, authorized, endorsed, or officially connected in any way with Formula 1, the FIA, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: F1 Telemetry schedule page with upcoming sessions and race calendar.

liveTiming.title: Live timing
liveTiming.description: Real-time F1 telemetry dashboard with live timing, driver positions, lap times, and race analytics. Follow Formula 1 races with detailed data.

map.title: Live map
map.description: F1 Telemetry live map of the Formula 1 race circuit.

announce.error: Las transcripciones para los audios de equipos estarán disponibles en breve.

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

tourSteps.welcome: Welcome to F1 Telemetry! We’ll give you a quick tour to show you everything you can do with our telemetry tools.
tourSteps.positions: Check out the live standings here—including tire compounds, pit history, gaps, lap times, and mini-sectors.
tourSteps.map: This map tracks every driver’s position on the track in real time. You can customize how it looks in the settings panel!
tourSteps.raceControlAndlaps: Keep an eye on race control messages like flags and penalties. You can also track current laps and track conditions.
tourSteps.header: The header shows you the session status, live weather, and your sync timer.
tourSteps.raceLogs: Catch up on team radio—listen to the audio, read the transcripts, or browse the session's message history.
tourSteps.doomCircle: The 'Circle of Doom' helps you visualize pit strategies and undercut windows in real time. When a driver pits, they’ll drop back to the PIT marker.
tourSteps.carDataCircle: This dial shows live data for your selected driver, like their current speed, RPM, and more.
tourSteps.preferences: Click here to open the preferences panel and tweak the telemetry layout exactly how you like it.
tourSteps.edit: Enter edit mode to move or resize any component. Give it a try on your desktop or laptop!
tourSteps.jokeIcon: The joke system icon lets you send messages that are broadcast to all users watching the session in real time, you only need to sign up.
